title: O'bella Professional Glider Ceramic Tourmaline Ionic Flat Iron Hair Straightener Straightens Adjustable Temp RM-55
features: Be Your Own Stylist -- O’bella Hair Straightener creates dramatic results in salon-quality performance, to quick straighten and flip your curl, even frizziest hair with minimal effort
Metal Ceramic Heater Plates -- Designed with ceramic and tourmaline ion plates, it allows a smoother transition from the flat iron on the hair, to limit the damage but keep the long lasting styling

Eliminate Frizz with Adjustable Temperature -- The temperature setting is adjustable from 250℉- 430℉ to keep sleek and smooth for all type hair. 250℉ - 340℉ for thin/fine hair, 355℉ - 390℉ for normal hair, 410℉ - 430℉ for thick/kinky hair
Be with You on Travel -- The straightener worldwide dual voltage is compatible with 110V - 220V, so you can take it in its sleek and chic package with you wherever you are
60-Minutes Auto Shut Off -- To ensure the maximum security, the straightener is equipped with a function allowing to turn off automatically 60 minutes after the last use
